price: او كله چې هغه پوره ځوانۍ ته ورسېد نو موږ حكم او علم وركړ او نېكانو ته په همدې ډول بدله وركوو.
arabic: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walammā balagha ashuddahu ātaynāhu ḥuk'man waʿil'man wakadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
